venue.name: Google Cambridge - 3rd Floor North End Cafe

item.description:
Sencha Ext & Sencha Touch are mature, & powerful frameworks that provide robust MVC abstractions, class-systems, and a wide array of UI components for building rich desktop browser & mobile web experiences. Come learn how to begin writing Ext.js apps using MVC & rich desktop / touch widgetry.

This meetup will be hosted at Google, Cambridge. Google will be providing free pizza and refreshments!

After the presentation / demonstration, we will go around the room introducing ourselves and asking the group for advice / opinions on any JavaScript-related issues members are facing.

Please RSVP and bring guests. :)

 

Aaron White

This month's speaker will be Aaron White, Co-Founder & CTO of Boundless Learning. Passionate about education, psychology & advanced programming languages. Co-creator of @Proxlet

http://restrictionisexpression.com/
item.name: Sencha Ext & Sencha Touch - Aaron White
